How it Works

Simplified
Healthcare.

Your Prescription

Safe & Secure Upload

prescription_scan.jpg

Fast Upload

Digitizing Prescription

Your handwritten or digital prescription is processed by our AI. We extract medicine names, dosages, and quantities instantly.

Pharmacy Network

Verified local pharmacies receive a notification. They check their inventory and confirm availability within seconds.

Competitive Bidding

Pharmacies place bids to offer you the best price. Our algorithm automatically filters and shows the most value-for-money offers.

Smart Logistics

Once you accept, a nearby rider is assigned. They pick up the verified packet and deliver it to you using the fastest route.

Why Choose Presco?

We are revolutionizing how you buy medicines by bringing the pharmacy to your fingertips.

Best Price Guarantee

Our unique real-time bidding system ensures you get the most competitive prices from verified local pharmacies in your area.
